diff_act: 1.automatically connect group or broadcast calls to the handset when it is off the hook
2.automatically connect group or broadcast calls to the handset

regen.absent_element: disconnecting or ending an ongoing group or broadcast call
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a means to disconnect or end an ongoing group or broadcast call

regen.absent_element: disconnecting or ending an ongoing group or broadcast call
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a mechanism for the driver to disconnect or end an ongoing group or broadcast call

regen.absent_element: disconnecting ongoing call when handset is put on hook
regen.new_specification: The system shall disconnect the ongoing group or broadcast call from the loudspeaker and connect it to the handset when the handset is taken off the hook, and vice versa.

label: be connected to the handset if the handset is off hook.
absence: situation of the handset is off hook
